name: TetraCubes
description:
Relive the experience of the classic 80s game in an exciting new 3D environment!

TetraCubes is a 3D puzzle game inspired by the classic 80s game.

The goal of Tetra Cubes is the same as in the classic Tetris, i.e. the player has to place the blocks that fall on the plane in such a way as to fill the entire grid, thus eliminating a number of rows ranging from a minimum of 1 to a maximum of 4 (at the same time) and increase the score.
However, in this version the player will face a greater challenge, as a third dimension is added, and therefore the blocks can rotate in 3 dimensions and take on many different positions.

The game has two modes:

  • Normal: For players who enjoy tough challenges;
  • Easymode: For players who want to get familiar with the game, so during the game  there will be a ghost block that will show the player where the current block will be placed.

Before starting the game, the player can become familiar with moving and rotating in 3 dimensions through the Training mode.

Enjoy the game!
